titleStmt.title: Ars pictoria, or, An academy treating of drawing, painting, limning, and etching to which are added thirty copper plates expressing the choicest, nearest and most exact grounds and rules of symetry / collected out of the most eminent Italian, German, and Netherland authors by Alexander Browne ...
titleStmt.author: Browne, Alexander, fl. 1660-1677.

biblFull.extent: [9], 110, [2] p., 30 leaves of plates : ill., port.
